column2:
"Unavailable menu and shop functions will be
unlocked as you progress through the story."

"When moving, press and hold <%Avoid> to
perform a high speed Photon Dash."

"After jumping with <%Jump>,
hold <%Jump> to use Photon Glide."

"When your HP drops during a fight, use
Resta Sign from your Subpalette to restore HP."

"Resta Sign and Reverser Sign are also
available for purchase from shops in the City."

"Press and hold the Main Menu button ()
to open the World Map. ※Excludes some platforms"

"You can use <%Function> + the arrow keys to quickly
scroll through your items in the Item Menu."

"Hunters boast high HP and defense,
letting them fight alone with ease."

"Rangers use shooting weapons to
engage enemies from a distance."

"Forces use Techniques to engage
enemies from a distance."

"Fighters sacrifice their defenses to
pummel enemies with all their strength."

"Gunners use their high mobility and barrages
of bullets to run rings around their enemies."

"Techters use Techniques to fight,
while also supporting other players."

"Bravers are flexible fighters who can easily
switch between close- and long-range weapons."

"Bouncers can easily trigger Physical Down and Attribute
Down effects to swing the battle in their favor."

"To read up on everything you might want to know, open
the Main Menu, select \"System\", then select \"Help\"."

"Alpha Reactors don't have any use for
players, but can be sold for a high price."

"N-Mission Badges can be traded for
items at the Item Exchange Shop."

"During a PSE Burst, enemies will keep appearing as long as the
Burst lasts, letting you earn lots of EXP, N-Meseta and items."

"Using Gold Prim Swords and similar items as material
will help you save N-Grinders when upgrading weapons."

"You can adjust optional graphical effects, such
as motion blur and bloom, from the Options menu."

"Up to 12 accessories can be attached,
as long as they are below the cost limit."

"You can choose where to attach accessories to
your character, as well as fine-tune their positions."

"By using the Toggle Costume function,
the character's body shape can be checked easily."

"You can freely customize the base, inner,
and outer parts of layering wear."

"You can adjust the voice pitch of your character
by using the Edit Voice function."

"If you focus your attacks on Nagrus's
arms, you may be able to Down it."

"When Nagrus sees ARKS in the air, it
will perform a powerful rushing attack."

"If your attacks can't reach Oruq's
body, try to aim for its dangling tail."

"If you destroy the armor on Oruq's head,
the exposed core will be a weak point."

"When Bujin is about to attack, a black
flash is emitted from its weapon."

"You can deal with Bujin's highly aggressive
attacks by focusing on countering it."

"If you can keep track of the arms Vallas launches, you
can avoid getting hit by attacks from your blind spot."

"While Vallas is firing its arms at you,
its core becomes easier to target."

"When Nex Aelio takes enough damage,
the cores on its sides will be exposed."

"When Nex Aelio takes a deep breath,
it's about to launch a powerful fireball."

"When Nex Vera starts charging up, it's
about to perform a very powerful attack."

"Nex Vera's powerful breath attack
can be interrupted by Downing it."

"The beam attack Daedal Sword fires from
its head can even hit targets behind it."

"If you focus your attacks on Daedal Sword's
foot, you may be able to Down it."

"Watch Daedal Axe closely to see when it's about
to perform its strongest attack, then counter it."

"Daedal Axe can be Downed
by Ice-Attribute attacks."

"If Pedas Vera targets you with its punching
attack, try to focus on avoiding it until it stops."

"Breaking the crystal that glows during
Pedas Vera's laser attack will expose its weak point."

"When Cragbear grabs you, you can escape
by rapidly entering movement inputs."

"Cragbear can launch long-range
shockwaves by swinging its arms."

"Before it roars, Ard Banther will spread
its paws and stomp on the ground."

"Ard Banther will fall over after its lunge
attack if all of its claws have been destroyed."

"If you try to get behind Ard Banther, it will
respond by clawing at you with its hind legs."

"Ard Banshee can be Downed
by Fire-Attribute attacks."

"When Thunder Banther inhales deeply,
it's about to use a powerful breath attack."

"Thunder Banther can be Downed
by Fire-Attribute attacks."

"If you try to evade Thunder Banshee's claw attacks by
dodging backwards, they may chase you and hit you anyway."

"Thunder Banshee's lightning attacks can inflict
the Shock status effect. Try to avoid them."

"Ciacurio has the ability to
strengthen other nearby enemies."

"When Ciacurio ignites the ground, it will continue
to burn and deal damage to you for a while."

"Wauron only uses its powerful spin attack
if you are far enough away from it."

"Wauron will only hide its face when it's
about to fire a powerful laser beam."

"You can avoid Big Frogga's jumping attack by
dodging left or right when its tail touches the ground."

"Big Frogga's poison shots can inflict the
Poison status effect. Try to avoid them."

"You can deal with El Discythe's agile
movement easily by Locking-On to it."

"El Discythe can be weakened by
destroying the sickles on both of its arms."

"Try to replenish your Resta Signs
in the field before you run out."

"When your HP gets low, the edges of the screen
will turn red to let you know you're in danger."

"When Destragras turns red and its arms transform, you can
destroy the barrels of its guns to reduce the number of shots it fires."

"When Destragras glows and leaps into the air, it's about
to perform a series of powerful wide-range attacks."

"サンドナグルスが地面を殴りつけた後は、
砂による追撃が発生する。"

"サンドナグルスが赤く変化し、腕が変形したときは、
腕を破壊することで追撃を減らすことができる。"

"リゼントスが赤く変化すると、
全身が変形し、攻撃範囲が大きく広がるので注意。"

"リゼントスの両足を破壊すると、
自身の攻撃で転倒するようになる。"
"フォートス・ランチャーが発射する弾は、アークスを追尾してくる。"

"フォートス・ランチャーの全身が発光したときは、
アークスを狙った上空からの攻撃をしてくる。"
"フォートス・レーザーは、直線的な攻撃を多くしてくる。"

"フォートス・レーザーの全身が発光したときは、
空中から全方位に対してレーザーによる攻撃をしてくる。"

"ケルクンドは、
一定の距離をとると急速に接近して攻撃してくる。"

"ケルクンドは激しい攻撃を繰り出してくるが、
しばらく攻撃したあとに大きな隙が生まれる。"

"レヌス・リテムの全身が鮮やかに発光するとダメージを受けなくなる。
尻尾を攻撃することで発光状態を解除できる。"

"レヌス・リテムが赤く変化したときに胴体部分に展開される武装は、
破壊することができる。"

"レヌス・ヴェラの全身が鮮やかに発光するとダメージを受けなくなる。
尻尾を攻撃することで発光状態を解除できる。"

"レヌス・ヴェラが赤く変化したときに胴体部分に展開される武装は、
破壊することができる。"

"スナイダル・ハンマーは、
音波によって周囲一帯を攻撃してくる。"

"スナイダル・ハンマーは、
打撃や音の振動で岩を隆起させて攻撃してくる。"

"スナイダル・ヴェラは、演奏に集中するとダメージを受けなくなる。
楽器を攻撃することで演奏状態を解除できる。"

"スナイダル・ヴェラの音波攻撃で、
\"ショック\"状態にならないように注意する。"

"You can prevent Bubble Crab from firing bubbles from
its claws by Downing it with its weakness Attribute."

"Bubble Crab uses the bubbles emanating
from its claws to perform powerful attacks."

"Sava Curio has the ability to
strengthen other nearby enemies."

"When Sava Curio ignites the ground, it will continue
to burn and deal damage to you for a while."

"Sava Wauron only uses its powerful spin attack
if you are far enough away from it."

"Sava Wauron will only hide its face when it's
about to fire a powerful laser beam."

"You can deal with Sava Discythe's agile
movement easily by Locking-On to it."

"Sava Discythe can be weakened by
destroying the sickles on both of its arms."

"When Dunebear grabs you, you can escape
by rapidly entering movement inputs."

"Dunebear can launch long-range
shockwaves by swinging its arms."
"ダークファルスは、その巨体を利用して強力な広範囲の攻撃を繰り出してくる。"

"ダークファルスの腕を破壊すると、
レスタサインとリバーサーサインが出現する。"

"グランマイザーが発射するミサイルは、アークスを追尾してくる。
思い切って懐に踏み込むか、移動し続けることで回避できる。"
"グランマイザーは、特定の攻撃後にコアを露出する。"

"ネクスは、
ダメージが蓄積すると身体が燃え上がり側面のコアが露出する。"

"ネクスは、
大きく息を吸い込んだあとに強力な火球攻撃をしてくる。"

"イクサブジンの左腕による攻撃前には、
左腕に黒い閃光が発生する。"

"イクサブジンにつかまれたときは、
振りほどくことはできない。"

"EXP and items earned during a Battledia will be
awarded all at once when the Quest is complete."

"Only players who use Battle Triggers will lose them, and
they will only be consumed when the Quest is cleared."

"At the start of the Quest, players who used Battle Triggers
will receive boosts, such as boosted EXP and Rare Drop Rate."

"EXP and items earned during a Battledia will be
awarded all at once when the Quest is complete."

"Only players who use Battle Triggers will lose them, and
they will only be consumed when the Quest is cleared."

"In Battledia: Purple, your rewards will change based on
how many Gigantix you can defeat within the time limit."
